pleaseSelectProject: Please select a project from the sidebar to begin.
mustBeOrgAdmin: You must be an Organization Admin to manage users.
manageUsersAndRoles: Manage users and their roles in your organization
name: Name
noUsersFound: No users found in this organization.

orgAdminTip.suffix: can manage all users and projects within the organization

designerTip.suffix: can create new projects and be assigned to projects with specific roles

memberTip.suffix: can be assigned to projects with specific project roles

deactivatedUserTip: • Deactivated users cannot log in but their data is preserved
cannotModifySelfTip: • You cannot modify or delete your own user account
addCommentsHere: Add comments here. Markdown is supported.
noDocumentsYet: No related documents yet. Click + to add one.
confirmDeleteDocument: Are you sure you want to delete Related Document {{id}}?
documentCommentPlaceholder: Additional notes or description about this document
selectDocumentPrompt: Select a document from the list or create a new one.
toeDescriptionInfo: Describe the Target of Evaluation using reStructuredText (RST). You can embed PlantUML or Mermaid diagrams to visualize architecture.
scopeInfo: Define the scope of the threat analysis and risk assessment.
includesAndExcludes: Specify what is included and excluded from the assessment.
excludedFromScopeDesc: Describe what is out of scope...
assumptionsInfo: Document assumptions about the system, environment, and threats.
toeConfigurationInfo: Define configuration items that make up the Target of Evaluation.
assetsInfo: Identify and document valuable assets that need protection.
threatsInfo: Identify potential threats to your assets.
securityClaimsInfo: Define security claims for your system.
securityControlsInfo: Document security controls implemented to protect assets.
misuseCasesInfo: Describe ways the system could be misused.
damageScenariosInfo: Define potential damage scenarios if threats materialize.
riskTreatmentInfo: Define how identified risks will be treated.
circumventTreesInfo: Visualize how security controls can be circumvented.
projectUsersInfo: Manage users assigned to this project.
noProjectUsersInfo: Project users cannot be managed directly. Add users through User Management.
traceabilityGraphInfo: Visualize relationships and dependencies between all TARA artifacts.
technicalAttackTreeDescription: Reusable attack pattern that can be referenced by multiple attack trees
technicalAttackTreesInfo: Technical attack trees are reusable attack patterns that can be referenced by multiple attack trees, circumvent trees, or other technical trees. They help you avoid duplicating common attack subtrees.
createTechnicalTreePrompt: Create your first technical attack tree to define reusable attack patterns.
cannotDeleteReferencedTechnicalTree: Cannot delete technical tree {{treeId}}. It is referenced by {{count}} node(s). Remove all references first.
cannotDeleteTechnicalTreeWithChildren: Cannot delete technical tree {{treeId}}. It has {{count}} child node(s). Remove all children first.
confirmDeleteTechnicalTree: Are you sure you want to delete the technical tree "{{treeId}}"?
technicalTreeTip1: Technical trees are optional - use them to avoid duplicating common attack patterns
technicalTreeTip2: Referenced technical trees appear as read-only nodes in attack trees
technicalTreeTip3: A technical tree can be referenced by attack trees, circumvent trees, or other technical trees
technicalTreeTip4: To delete a technical tree, first remove all references to it and all its child nodes
mitreAttackDatabaseDescription: Browse and import techniques from the MITRE ATT&CK knowledge base into your TARA as technical attack trees.
mitreLoadError: Failed to load MITRE ATT&CK database. Please check your installation and try again.
mitreSearchPlaceholder: Search techniques by ID, name, or description...
noTechniquesFound: No techniques found matching your filters.
selectTechniqueToViewDetails: Select a technique to view details
mitreImportSuccess: Successfully imported MITRE technique {{techniqueId}} as technical attack tree {{rootId}}.
mitreImportFailed: Failed to import MITRE technique. Please try again.
